title: Read this riot.
body: Players who build troll but have positive KDA's should still be considered griefers and banned. E.G: Full adc neeko

replies.body:
So players who build support but are trash deserve medals, but those that build off-meta and do well deserve bans.
Backwards day is fun.

KDA means nothing, only the ability to close out a game. Late game an ADC neeko is useless because building AD doesnt scale well with her kit, AP does. Meanwhile you have full AD vayne 3 hitting everyone on the team and shredding tanks like butter. 

You're not a competitive player if you build off meta, full stop. If you're not going to be competitive in ranked that is griefing.
But if they were actually playing to win, then its fine. Perhaps they haven't dropped to their ranked monkey division yet?

Yes but that's the thing if you're playing to win you'd be building meta, not building a mage champion as a marksman. Why intentionally handicap yourself and your team just because you think you're entitled to? I have nothing against giving yourself a challenge like this in non-ranked games. Ranked should only be about playing meta, or if you think you have something that can be a new meta try it. But by no means should a mage ever build as a marksman or vice versa. Even corki and ezreal, marksman that can build hybrid lean more towards their marksman strenths and that is because they are marksman and their builds utilize the hybrid builds. A neeko with IE and Shiv on the other hand is straight trolling. I understand this isn't going to be a popular opinion on forums because most of the people here are casual players but the vast majority of high mmr players agree with this statement which is why im curious as to the reason RIOT doesn't punish these types of players. 

Its not a matter of me being toxic to these kinds of players its just a general concern with gameplay, by definition it is griefing.
Because this game is not run by a totalitarian regime, people can get creative if they want. Do you understand this simple human interaction?
Do you not understand that I said its fine to be creative in normals? You're just taking the piss aren't you. Go troll your ranked games then.

And who are you to dictate which mode people can or cant theory craft on? 

Your problem is not that those players are feeding; But, because what they are doing is outside the scope of your understanding.

> most of the people here are casual players but the vast majority of high mmr players agree with this statement

You're ALL CASUALS. Unless this is going on your resume, or a part of your job. This game is a worthless financial contribution.

Yea its outside my scope of understanding why you would build crit neeko in a ranked game. You are correct. Here i thought ranked games was about climbing the ladder but clearly I am so feeble minded as to assume that was the case. Clearly ranked is the game mode we choose  to play to theory craft and have fun with random builds. How could I have been so blind.
You know how taric and sona bottom lane became meta? Yea, think on it.
You know how champion picks and champion builds are different things? Yea, think on it.

It share the same fundamental principle called Idea. In order to refine an idea, one must take it through a series of trials. 

Just like how you are trying to out do me, it all starts with a step.
